channel.title: Ideas on Asep Bagja & Co.
channel.description: Recent content in Ideas on Asep Bagja & Co.

item.title: My Family’s Journey to Grow Our Own Food
item.description: My wife’s dream after we married was having a garden at home.

item.title: Is Learning to Code Necessary for Everyone?
item.description: Although coding is not a basic communication skill for human, I prefer to encourage people for learning it, especially for someone who wants to expresses and develops his/her idea in technology industry but doesn’t come from computer science background.
